update_content.zh: 1、登录账号信息界面添加多语言设置接口
update_content.en: 1. Add a multi-language setting interface to the login account information screen.

update_content.zh: 1、LevelEnd 兼容extroInfo不能传空问题
update_content.en: 1. Fixed the LevelEnd event error.

update_content.zh: 1、修复SDK内部事件上报问题
update_content.en: 1. Fixed SDK internal event reporting issues.

update_content.zh: 1、优化SDK内部事件上报
update_content.en: 1. Optimize SDK internal event reporting

update_content.zh: 1、新增已购订阅商品信息查询接口
update_content.en: 1. Added the interface for querying information about purchased and subscribed products

update_content.zh:
1、修复Facebook回传数据报错问题 
 2、修复在线参数获取事件重复上报、部分事件eventname不合法问题
update_content.en: 1. Fix Sdk crash issue

update_content.zh:
1、修复h5广告重复初始化firebase问题 
 2、修复topon广告回调不在主线程执行问题 
 3、归因信息回传新增Facebook数据
update_content.en:
1. Fixed h5 AD duplicate initialization firebase issue 
 2. AFixed topon AD callbacks not executing on the main thread 
 3. Attributing information back added Facebook data

update_content.zh:
1、修复 Unity Editor 登录报错问题 
 2、新增 Admob 折叠 Banner
update_content.en:
1. Fix Unity Editor login failure 
 2. Add Admob fold banner

update_content.zh: 1、修复断网重连后同一个商品无法再次购买问题
update_content.en: 1. Fixed the problem that the same item cannot be purchased again after the network is disconnected

update_content.zh:
1、添加IAP初始化回调 
 2、购买回调添加购买状态码 
 3、优化H5 Ads埋点
update_content.en:
1. Add IAP initialization callback 
 2. Purchase callback add purchase status code 
 3. Optimize the H5 Ads burial point

update_content.zh: 1、修复Unity Iap插件新版本打包失败问题
update_content.en: 1.Fix for Unity Iap plugin new version packaging failure

update_content.zh:
1、修复H5广告展示时切后台回来不给回调问题 
 2、打开账号登录界面登录类型兼容auto
update_content.en:
1.Fixed H5 AD display when the background cut back does not give callback issue.
 2.Open the account login page Login type compatible with auto.

update_content.zh: 1、修复在初始化SDK后立即调用登录接口报错问题
update_content.en: 1.Fixed an error when calling the login interface after initializing the SDK.

update_content.zh: 1、修复断网登录失败清空本地userID问题
update_content.en: 1.Fixed the problem that the local userID failed to be cleared.

update_content.zh: 1、新增登录账号信息界面
update_content.en: 1.Added the login account information page

update_content.zh:
1、推送权限改为主动获取 
 2、更新 Max/Topon 三方广告源 
 3、IAP启动补单逻辑改为主动调用 
4、支持Unity2022.3及以前版本出Android34包 
5、移除 HCIVPositionName/HCRVPositionName接口，只支持传string，开发者需自定义枚举转string传入
update_content.en:
1.Push permission changed to active access 
 2.Update Max/Topon tripartite AD feed 
3.IAP start replenishment logic is changed to active call 
4.Support for Unity2022.3 and earlier versions of Android34 package 
5.Remove HCIVPositionName/HCRVPositionName interface, only support string, developers need to turn the string into a custom enumeration

update_content.zh:
1、新增推送功能 
 2、Android平台修复ReviewException转换异常崩溃问题
update_content.en:
1.new push notification function 
 2.Android platform to fix the ReviewException conversion exception crash problem

update_content.zh: 1、移除Adjust imei文件
update_content.en: 1.Remove the Adjust imei file

update_content.zh: 1、修复Android打包报错问题
update_content.en: 1.Fixed Android packaging error

update_content.zh:
1、新增smaato/moloco/verve/bigo广告源 
2、新增Adjust SDK 签名功能
3、新增Adjust/Firebase 收益上报分离 
4、新增敏感词接口
 5、优化H5广告
update_content.en:
1.Added smaato/moloco/verve/bigo AD feed 
2.Added the Adjust SDK signing function 
3.New Adjust/Firebase revenue reporting separation 
4.Added sensitive word interfaces 
5.Optimize H5 advertising

update_content.zh:
1、修复unity2021.3.28+ SDK版本Android打包失败 
2、Google登录无Google框架时使用游客登录
3、新增iOS/Android内购连续续订功能 
4、更新Adjust/数数/Firebase SDK
 5、升级Unity IAP 插件4.9.4->4.12.0
update_content.en:
1.Fixed unity2021.3.28+ SDK version android packaging failure 
2.Google Login Use Visitor login when there is no Google framework 
3.Added continuous renewal function for iOS/Android in-app purchases 
4.Update the Adjust/TD/Firebase SDK 
5.Upgrade Unity IAP plugin 4.9.4->4.11.0

update_content.zh:
1、新增H5广告 
2、优化iOS Google 绑定接口
3、移除 Facebook 默认相关ID 
4、增加隐私跳转web接口
5、优化iOS native 布局
 6、新增删除全部SDK文件功能
update_content.en:
1.add H5 ads 
2.optimize iOS Google bidding interface 
3.remove Facebook default related ID 
4.add privacy jump web interface 
5.optimize iOS native layout 
6.add delete all SDK file function

update_content.zh:
1、更新 Max/Facebook SDK 
2、iOS平台增加 GameCenter 登录
3、新增Debug面板
update_content.en:
1.Update Max/Facebook SDK. 
2.Added GameCenter login for iOS. 
3. Add debug menu.

update_content.zh:
1、修复插屏与激励视频广告时间间隔不生效问题 
2、安卓平台增加 Google Play Games Services 登录
update_content.en:
1.Fixed an issue where the interstitial and rewardVideo AD intervals did not take effect 
2.Added Google Play Games Services login for Android

update_content.zh:
1、支持TopOn/Max双聚合 
2、支持Firebase ABTest
3、支持Google DMA 许可策略 
4、更新 Adjust/Facebook SDK
update_content.en:
1.Supports TopOn/Max dual aggregation 
2.Firebase ABTest is supported. 
3.Support for Google DMA licensing policies. 
 4. Update Adjust/Facebook SDK.

update_content.zh:
1、激励视频没准备好时允许游戏传入提示文字 
2、网络断开时补单逻辑优化
3、新增激励视频/插屏展示接口，允许传string 表示点位
update_content.en:
1.The reward video is not ready to allow the game to pass prompt text. 
2.Optimization of internal purchase replenishment logic when the network is disconnected. 
3.The new reward video/interstitial show interface, allowing string to represent the pos.

update_content.zh: 1、优化Admob（Android)初始化/请求
update_content.en: 1.Optimize Admob (Android) initialization/request.

1、日志开关通过在线参数控制
2、修复json序列化问题
3、新增数数上报参数
update_content.en:
1.Log switch controls 
2.through online parameters, fixes json serialization problems 
3.adds ThinkingData reporting parameters.

update_content.zh: 1、优化激励视频广告，无激励视频时由插屏广告替补
update_content.en: 1.Optimize reward video ads, and replace them with interstitials when there is no reward video.

update_content.en: 1.Fixed the interstitial ad spacing issue.

2、新增firebase崩溃分析

1. Optimize the adjust initialization time.
2. Added firebase crash analysis.
3. Fix the bug.

update_content.zh: 1、修复bug
update_content.en: 1. fix bugs.

update_content.zh: 1、所有需要填写的ID均改为配置文件读取
update_content.en: 1. All ids to be filled in are read from the configuration file.

update_content.zh: 1、展示激励视频接口新增 toast 弹框参数，默认开启
update_content.en: 1. Add the toast pop-up parameter to the display incentive video interface, which is enabled by default
